channel.title: Hybrid-Analysis on Policy to Packets
channel.description: Recent content in Hybrid-Analysis on Policy to Packets

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 84
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC104 alert writeup investigating a malware detection event (EventID 84), validating the WinRAR installer hash using VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, reviewing SIEM logs, and determining a false positive from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC145 - Ransomware Detected - EventID 92
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC145 ransomware alert writeup investigating a true positive malware detection (EventID 92), validating Avaddon ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying EDR removal, and initiating endpoint containment from a SOC analyst perspective.

item.title: [Writeup] LetsDefend - SOC104 - Malware Detected - EventID 36
item.author: reedveggleston@gmail.com (Reed Eggleston)
item.description: Step-by-step LetsDefend SOC104 alert writeup investigating a malware detection (EventID 36), confirming Maze ransomware via VirusTotal and Hybrid Analysis, identifying C2 communication, and executing containment from a SOC analyst perspective.
